lead_paragraph: Deanna Nolan scored 21 points and Taj McWilliams-Franklin added 19 to help the Detroit Shock reach the W.N.B.A. finals for the third consecutive season.
snippet: Deanna Nolan scored 21 points and Taj McWilliams-Franklin added 19 to help the Detroit Shock reach the W.N.B.A. finals for the third consecutive season.
